statements: DELETE FROM customers_segmentation WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customers_segmentation WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND occupation IN ('Engineer', 'Doctor');
DELETE FROM customers_segmentation WHERE behavior = 'Impulsive' OR preferences = 'Tech-savvy';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' OR location LIKE '%California%';
DELETE FROM Segmentation WHERE behavior = 'Impulsive' AND preferences = 'Luxury';
DELETE FROM customers_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender='male';
DELETE FROM customers_behavior WHERE behavior_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM customers_preferences WHERE discount_preference = TRUE;
DELETE FROM customers_behavior WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_demographics WHERE age < 30);
DELETE FROM customers_preferences WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers_demographics WHERE location = 'New York');
